sect1.title: Change Log
sect1.para: Please note that the Change Log only lists which editor was responsible for putting the changes into SVN; please read the page in Chapter 1 for details on who wrote what.

listitem.para: [wblaszcz] - Added new package, WebKitGTK+-1.1.15.1 and minor ammendments to ICU.
[wblaszcz] - Added new package, ICU-4.2.1 and some minor ammendments to samba3-client, rsync-client, cyrus-sasl, gnome-screensaver, python-modules, and scrollkeeper.
[bdubbs] - Added back the package management page.
[wblaszcz] - Added new package, PyGtkSourceView-2.8.0 and updated to Gnome-Python-Desktop-2.28.0.
[ag] - Apply a sed to procmail to rename the internal getline function, to avoid conflict with getline from glibc.
[wblaszcz] - Updated to gcalctool-5.28.2 and minor ammendment to udev.
[wblaszcz] - Updated to GNOME Games-2.28.2 and a minor ammendment to ggz-client-libs.
[wblaszcz] - Updated to GNOME Media-2.28.1 and minor ammendments to gtk+2 and gobject-introspection.
[wblaszcz] - Updated to libgnomeprintui-2.18.4 and minor ammendment to libgnomeprint.
[wblaszcz] - Updated to libgnomeprint-2.18.6 and minor ammendments to zenity, metacity, and libwnck.
[wblaszcz] - Updated to GStreamer Good Plug-ins-0.10.17 and minor ammendments to gconf and gnome-doc-utils.
[wblaszcz] - Updated to GDM-2.28.2 and minor ammendment to gnome-panel.
[wblaszcz] - Removed GNOME VFS Monikers-2.15.3 from GNOME Core.
[wblaszcz] - Updated to Yelp-2.28.1 and minor ammendment to gnome-session, gnome-control-center, gnome-applets, and gnome-settings-daemon.
[wblaszcz] - Updated to Nautilus-2.28.4 and minor ammendment to polkit.
[wblaszcz] - Updated to libgnomekbd-2.28.2 and some minor ammendments to libgtop.
[wblaszcz] - Updated to VTE-0.22.5 and some minor ammendments to gnome-menus and libgweather.
[wblaszcz] - Updated to gnome-keyring-2.28.2 and some minor ammendments to brasero and guile.
[wblaszcz] - Added new package, brasero-2.28.2 and a minor ammendment to Totem-2.28.1.
[wblaszcz] - Updated to Totem-2.28.1 and some minor ammendments to gnome-intro.
[wblaszcz] - Updated to DeviceKit-power-012 and some minor amendments to udev and acl.
[dj] - Bumped xorg download releases to 7.5-2 to account for dropped driver packages.
[wblaszcz] - Fixed up libcanberra.schemas file location in libcanberra-0.18.

[bdubbs] - Updated to seamonkey-2.0. Removed enigmail from seamonkey because the required compatibility updates have not been finalized. Note that enigmail has not supported 64-bit builds in the past.
[wblaszcz] - Fixed up gnome-applets with stickynotes patch.
[wblaszcz] - Updated to GNOME Virtual File System-2.24.2.
[gdalziel] - Updated to GTK+-2.18.3. Thanks to Spinal for submitting the information about libjpeg 7 and the fix.
[Chris] - Various updates to Other Programming Tools page.
[dj] - Removed xkb from list of configuration files moved to /etc/X11.
[dj] - Moved items not part of the official xorg distribution to the correct sections of the book.
[dj] - Added sed to freeglut to remove -Werror from CFLAGS and CXXFlags in FreeGLUT.
[dj] - Changed FreeGLUT required dependency to MesaLib instead of X-Window-System.
[Chris] - Updated Organization page to reflect the book's current layout, and various other text fixes/updates.
[wblaszcz] - Fixed GDM greeter icon problem. Updated Rarian with correct localstatedir.
[wblaszcz] - Patched GConf-2.26.2 and GDM-2.26.1 to fix a hardcoded sysconfdir problem.
[wblaszcz] - Added a patch to fix a compatibility issue between libgnomekbd-2.26.0 and libxklavier-4.0.
[wblaszcz] - Added a patch to fix a compatibility issue between gnome-control-center-2.26.0 and libxklavier-4.0.
[dj] - Corrected broken NSS patch - updated to nss-3.12.4-standalone-2.patch.
[dj] - Updated Xorg-7.4 modules to latest stable versions.
[wblaszcz] - Added new package. GNOME Settings Daemon-2.26.1
[wblaszcz] - Updated to gnome-backgrounds-2.24.1. Added DocBook dependency to Rarian. Move gail, eel, gnome-keyring, and GNOME Icon Theme to different sections of the book.
[gdalziel] - Updated to NTP-4.2.4p7. Added a patch to fix MOD_NANO definition.
[dj] - Removed unnecessary convert-mans commands in shadow instructions, and replaced invalid convert-mans commands with equivalent iconv commands in MC.
[wblaszcz] - Updated to GNOME Virtual File System-2.24.1.
[gdalziel] - Updated to FAAC-1.28. Added a patch to fix a function conflict with Glibc.
[gdalziel] - Updated to GPL Ghostscript-8.64. Removed ESP Ghostscript and references to it. Thanks to Ken for the patches and information about JasPer.
[gdalziel] - Added a patch to Cdrtools-2.01 to fix function conflicts with Glibc.
[gdalziel] - Updated to NcFTP-3.2.3. Thanks to Spinal for the report about the global config file.
[gdalziel] - Updated to usbutils-0.84. Thanks again to Matthew the information.
[gdalziel] - Updated to pciutils-3.1.3. Thanks to Matthew for the hint about install-lib.
[gdalziel] - Updated to GnuPG-2.0.12. Added --docdir and --enable-symcryptrun to command explanations.
[randy] - Removed unnecessary references to pkgconfig as it is now in LFS.
[gdalziel] - Updated to Poppler-0.10.7. Added OpenJPEG and GLib 2 to recommended dependencies and moved libjpeg and cairo to recommended. Added --enable-xpdf-headers to command explanations.
[randy] - Added new package libunique-1.0.8, thanks to Wayne Blaszczyk for contributing the patch.
[gdalziel] - Added sed to remove obsolete -fforce-mem from libmad.
[gdalziel] - Added --enable-nasm to command explanations in lame.
[randy] - Added Berkeley DB dependencies as the package is no longer built in LFS.
[ag] - Enable GDBM as the default header cache backend for mutt.
[randy] - Commented out all unnecessary references to GDBM as that package is now built in LFS.
[randy] - Added new package liboil-0.3.16, thanks to Wayne Blaszczyk for contributing the patch.
[ken] - Added a patch to libtiff to fix various vulnerabilities.
[gdalziel] - Added a patch to Mutt to fix an SMTP issue causing Mutt to be unusable for scripted email.
[gdalziel] - Added a note to Mutt about the use of GnuPG2.
[ag] - Added a note to ZSH about disabling the use of GDBM when multiple partitions are in use. Thanks to Guy Dalziel for his patch.
[bdubbs] - Added a note to dash that creating a symlink to sh will need to be reverted to bash when building LFS. Changed the role of the symlink instruction to 'nodump' for alfs.
[dj] - Removed Root Certificates page and added ca-bundle instructions to OpenSSL page.
[dj] - Updated dependencies for Xorg Server to include pixman and removed pixman from Xorg Libs wget list.
[dj] - Added Root Certificates as recommended dependency to OpenSSL and changed installation path for ca-bundle.crt.
[bdubbs] - Added a switch to aRts to prevent a build problem.
[randy] - Added pkg-config as a required dependency of the libusb-compat package, thanks to Matt for pointing it out.
[randy] - Replaced two patches with seds in the Python instructions, also updated the dependencies and installed programs sections.
[randy] - Added commands to the Tcl instructions to install optional documentation.
[ag] - Updated to ed-1.2. Added --bindir=/bin switch and removed the make install-man command.
[robert] - Update url for Taglib on kdemultimedia page.
[ag] - Fixed a sed command in Kdemultimedia, spotted by Robert Connolly.
[ag] - Updated to mutt-1.5.19. Thanks to William Immendorf for providing the patch.
[ag] - Updated to gnupg-1.4.9. Remove setuid command.
[ken] - Updated to gstreamer-0.10.21 with gst-plugins-base-0.10.21, gst-plugins-good-0.10.11 and gst-plugins-ugly-0.10.10.
[bdubbs] - Updated link to URW Fonts in kdelibs.
[dj] - Removed XDM instructions from the X Window System Components page.
[thomas] - Add anduin as download location to Ant.
[dj] - Removed duplicate libusb dependency from HAL.
[dj] - Specified only Xorg-7.4 libraries for dbus dependency on Xorg.
[dj] - Added OpenSSL dependency to Xorg Server, and removed invalid dependency for xcb-util.
[dj] - Specified only Xorg-7.4 libraries for lesstiff dependency on Xorg.
[bdubbs] - Tweaked sane-backends instructions for proper udev and gid settings.
[bdubbs] - Updated to alsa-1.0.18. alsa-firmware and alsa-oss are still at 1.0.17.
[bdubbs] - Update to sane-backends-1.0.19. Added scanner group.
[bdubbs] - Removed GMP and MPFR since they are now in LFS.
[bdubbs] - Changed PCI Utils to use uncompressed pci.ids file.
[ag] - Added a patch to imlib2-1.4.2 to fix CVE-2008-5187.
[ken] - Referenced patches for cpio, id3lib, flac, cdrdao, gamin to make them build again.
[dj] - Removed all XFree86 and monlithic Xorg references.
[ken] - Update to audacious-1.5.1 with audacious-plugins-1.5.1, libmowgli-0.7.0 and libmcs-0.7.1.
[ken] - Updated to libpng-1.2.33, with the apng patch needed for firefox3.
[ken] - Updated to glib-2.18.2, pango-1.22.2, atk-1.24.0, gtk+-2.14.4.
[dj] - Added lesstif to Mesa optional dependencies and added '--enable-motif' to command explanations.
[dj] - Added instructions to exclude the use of evdev driver when testing the xorg server.
[thomas] - Update to FOP-0.95 (#2392 and #2566 for JAI location).
[thomas] - Fix a compiler issue (undefined NULL) in inetutils-1.5, fixes #2589
[Chris] - Removed obsolete reference to Coreutils hostname patch from Net-Tools instructions.
[randy] - Modified all the Sourceforge download URLs to use a newly created entity instead of a hard-coded URL.
[randy] - Updated all the LFS package versions (in the book text, not the actual package updates) to current Development LFS.
